sql-case.value: SELECT * FROM (SELECT level, o.* FROM t_order o WHERE o.order_id = 1 START WITH o.user_id = 1 CONNECT BY PRIOR user_id = user_id ORDER BY level) temp WHERE ROWNUM = 1
SELECT * FROM (SELECT level FROM dual START WITH level = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR level = level) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT level FROM dual CONNECT BY PRIOR level = ?) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT level FROM dual START WITH level = ? CONNECT BY PRIOR level = ?) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT level FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR(?, 1, level) IS NOT NULL) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= ?
SELECT * FROM (SELECT level FROM dual CONNECT BY REGEXP_SUBSTR('abc ? def', 1, level) IS NOT NULL) temp WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
